channel.title: Glitch and granular effects for guitar
channel.description:
I made a video about patches I've been messing around with for guitar processing. Thanks to all the community contributors/coders for making the many non-factory objects that make stuff like this possible.
I'll upload my patches here very soon - I'm away from my computer right now.
https://youtu.be/pjeHsirWENQ

item.title: Glitch and granular effects for guitar
item.dc:creator: @brucewallace Bruce Wallace
item.description:
@brucewallace wrote:

grannysweller.axp (10.8 KB)
rainbowglitcher.axp (20.5 KB)
Here are the patches. They're Pretty messy, and might require some input level tweaking seeing as they use threshold triggering. I'll tidy them up and put comments/instructions on them as soon as I have the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Glitch and granular effects for guitar

item.title: Glitch and granular effects for guitar
item.dc:creator: @dontjudgedave David
item.description:
@dontjudgedave wrote:

This is great - would love to try out the patches!

You might be interested in how I put togetther my glitch/stutter patch - https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/wip-stutter-glitch-effect/5865

Read full topic
item.source: Glitch and granular effects for guitar

item.title: Glitch and granular effects for guitar
item.dc:creator: @weasel79 blender
item.description:
@weasel79 wrote:

hey man, these are super dope, congrats! love all the threshold/trigger stuff.
thanks for making the video, would be really cool to also get the projects in here for people to enjoy, possibly with a little documentation on what/why?

Read full topic
